title.narrative: Governments and civil society are able to assess and inform progress in the implementation of the Beijing Declaration and Platform for Action, the SDGs as well as other global and regional normative frameworks

description.narrative: This outcome is focused on the strengthening the capacity of governments and civil society so that they will be able to assess and and inform progress of the implementation of the BPfA, SDGs and other global and regional normative frameworks.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan
